Class TestReport

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--nz.co.invensysenergy.test.TestReport
public class TestReport
extends java.lang.Object

This class accumulates the results of tests as they are run.

test - The test that failed.

public void report()
Prints a report of the tests to System.out.

getExitCode

public int getExitCode()
Determines the appropriate exit code for the program to use. Since the TINI does not support deamon threads, and you never can tell what threads have been set up during testing, even a successful run of tests should call System.exit().
